target.mrk: 機能およびシステム互換性

trans-unit.source: Monitor the compatibility of business operations with the version required for the business operations to work.

seg-source.mrk: Monitor the compatibility of business operations with the version required for the business operations to work.

target.mrk: 業務オペレーションと作業する業務オペレーションに必要なバージョンとの互換性を監視します。

trans-unit.source: The overview card displays a chart that specifies the number of operations that are compatible, not configured, and that are not compatible for a particular operation.

seg-source.mrk: The overview card displays a chart that specifies the number of operations that are compatible, not configured, and that are not compatible for a particular operation.

target.mrk: 概要カードには、特定の作業との互換性がある作業の数、未設定の作業の数、および特定の作業との互換性がない作業の数を指定するチャートが表示されます。

trans-unit.source: Selecting an element in the chart opens the <uicontrol>Monitor Compatibility of Central Procurement Operations</uicontrol> app, which provides more detailed information about the features, business processes, connected systems, and minimum version required for a particular operation to work.

seg-source.mrk: Selecting an element in the chart opens the <uicontrol>Monitor Compatibility of Central Procurement Operations</uicontrol> app, which provides more detailed information about the features, business processes, connected systems, and minimum version required for a particular operation to work.

target.mrk: チャート内の要素を選択すると、<uicontrol>集中調達作業の互換性監視</uicontrol>アプリが開き、機能、ビジネスプロセス、接続済システム、および特定の作業の実行に必要な最小バージョンに関する詳細情報が表示されます。

trans-unit.source: If you have no entry or information on the overview card, you can select the title of the card to navigate directly to the <uicontrol>Monitor Compatibility of Central Procurement Operations</uicontrol> app and choose <uicontrol>Refresh</uicontrol>. This displays a list of connected systems and provides details about whether or not the configurations for the connected systems have been maintained correctly.

seg-source.mrk: If you have no entry or information on the overview card, you can select the title of the card to navigate directly to the <uicontrol>Monitor Compatibility of Central Procurement Operations</uicontrol> app and choose <uicontrol>Refresh</uicontrol>.
This displays a list of connected systems and provides details about whether or not the configurations for the connected systems have been maintained correctly.

target.mrk: 概要カードに関するエントリや情報がない場合は、カードのタイトルを選択して、<uicontrol>集中調達作業の互換性監視</uicontrol>アプリに直接ナビゲートし、<uicontrol>リフレッシュ</uicontrol>を選択します。
これにより、接続済システムの一覧が表示され、接続済システムの設定が正しく更新されているかどうかについての詳細が示されます。
